text: Hello
Hello yourself. How are you today.
I'm very good! Thanks. Are you interested in donating some of your payment to a children's charity?
I'm sure I might be.
Okay, cool. So, it's basically going to an organisation that helps kids in war zones like Syria. They help make payments for things like formula and diapers.
That sounds like a good organization. I'd probably like to help them.

That's great! They are a trustworthy organisation that has an international impact from hunger in the United States to medical aid in the middle east. Have you heard about the state of their hospitals? It's really a dire situation.
Are you asking me to donate? I could donate half of my bonus, or $1.00.
I am! Every penny counts. It could be a great service to children across the world. It would be very generous of you. Have you made one before? Or to an aid cause like Save the Children?
Yes certainly I've donated before, from UNICEF to the Red Cross. I'm not really familiar with save the children however, but they seem worthwhile..
Their goals are pretty parallel with UNICEF, actually. Overall pretty broad as well. They help girls from different countries get the education they wouldn't otherwise receive among other support.
Okay then. One dollar it is. I'm glad to help.
Awesome, thanks. I might add some too. It looks pretty reputable
Is that it? If so, nice talking to you.
I think we need at least ten messages each. Nice talking to you as well
Ah! I haven't been counting. Do we need to chat some more?
Haha, I think so!
Well then, about myself, I'm a grandfather and I care a lot about seeing that children are cared for.

That's wonderful. I'm a college student myself. I actually room with a couple international students from impoverished countries. It's so different from the states. Many times, very sad. It's humbling.
Yes, I feel terrible when we send bombs and guns rather than food. The little ones can't do anything but suffer.
Yes, I agree. It was wonderful speaking with you, sir. Have a nice evening!
The system wants an explicit donation agreement. It's $1
